::Triggerhappy/Skullgrin/Jume/Whee::

    Triggerhappy, Skullgrin, Jume and=
 Whee all arrived at the Dark Avian.  Triggerhappy and Skullgrin transforme=
d to robot mode.  They looked at Jume and Whee.

    "Do the same, you dild=
ocons," Triggerhappy said, then spat some oil on the ground and rubbed it i=
n with his foot.

    Jume and Whee were at the kind of silence you can hea=
r for a moment, then they each transformed to robot mode.

     Skullgrin k=
neecapped Y- I mean -Triggerhappy.

     "Dildocons!?" Skullgrin whispered =
angrily, "Real smart!  That's sure to make them take less time about consid=
ering the Decepticons!  So don't insult 'em....to much."

     Triggerhappy=
 nodded, then spat again, and looked at Jume and Whee.

     "Well, come on=
 in the base.  Yer on the friend list now," Triggerhappy said.
 
     Jume =
and Whee looked at each other, then followed Skullgrin and Triggerhappy as =
they walked into the base.  

     "Hey everybody, we got ourselves some ne=
w Decepticons!  Meet Jume and Whee!" Triggerhappy shouted.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~~~~
~~~~~~~LurkerAbyss~~~~~~~
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
~The Keeper Of S=
ouls~
~The Shadow Of The Dark~
~I Am The Lurker Of The Abyss~
